verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3048>collection<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> I gave <S%G1299>order<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>.

Upon <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%> let each <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G1438>him<s%> in <S%G2343>store<s%>, as5100, Leviticus2 he may <S%G2137>prosper<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3048>collections<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> made when5119, 3752 I <S%G2064>come<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G3854>arrive<s%>, whomsoever3739, 1437 ye shall <S%G1381>approve<s%>, <S%G5128>them<s%> will I <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G1992>letters<s%> to <S%G667>carry<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5485>bounty<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>:
and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G514>meet<s%> for me to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%>, they shall <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> I shall have passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> I pass <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> it <S%G2228>may<s%> be <S%G5177>that<s%> I shall <S%G3887>abide<s%>, or <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3914>winter<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> may <S%G4311>set<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> forward on my <S%G4311>journey<s%> whithersoever3757, 1437 I <S%G4198>go<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G2309>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> wish to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3938>way<s%>; for <S%G5100>I<s%> <S%G1679>hope<s%> to tarry1961, Acts0 a <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2010>permit<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> I will <S%G1961>tarry<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4005>Pentecost<s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1756>effectual<s%> is opened <S%G455>unto<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G480>adversaries<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> without <S%G870>fear<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2038>worketh<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> also <S%G2532>do<s%>:

let <S%G1848><s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4311>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4311>forward<s%> on his journey <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>: <S%G1551>for<s%> I <S%G1551>expect<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G4012>touching<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G3870>I<s%> <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3843>all<s%> his <S%G2307>will<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> he will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall have <S%G2119>opportunity<s%>.
Watch <S%G1127>ye<s%>, stand <S%G4739>fast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, quit you like <S%G407>men<s%>, be <S%G2901>strong<s%>.
Let <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5216>ye<s%> <S%G3956>do<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.

Now I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%> (ye <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that they have <S%G5021>set<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1248>minister<s%> unto the <S%G40>saints<s%>),

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> unto <S%G5108>such<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4903>helpeth<s%> in the work <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2872>laboreth<s%>.

And I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> at the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5415>Fortunatus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G883>Achaicus<s%>: for <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> your <S%G5216>part<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G378>supplied<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they <S%G373>refreshed<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>: <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G5108>such<s%>.

The <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4252>Prisca<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.
All <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>. <S%G782>Salute<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss<s%>.
The <S%G783>salutation<s%> <S%G3972>of<s%> me <S%G3972>Paul<s%> with mine <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.
If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5368>loveth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, let him <S%G2277>be<s%> <S%G331>anathema<s%>. <S%G3134>Maranatha<s%>.
